function renderLine( line, pattern)
for i=1, strlen(pattern) do
local c = strsub( pattern, i, i)
if c == "#" then
set_stone("st-actorimpulse_invisible", i-1,line)
elseif c=="I" then
set_stone("st-invisible", i-1,line)
elseif c=="0" then
set_item("it-crack0", i-1,line)
elseif c=="1" then
set_item("it-crack1", i-1,line)
elseif c=="R" then
--set_actor("ac-rotor", i-1+0.5,line+0.5, {mouseforce=1, range=50, force=20}) set_actor("ac-rotor", i-1+0.5,line+0.5, {range=50, force=20})
elseif c=="O" then
oxyd(i-1,line)
end
end
end
